mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_basic VALUES (recipe_basic_seq.NEXTVAL, #{custpin}, #{custid}, #{nickname}, #{type}, #{situation}, #{ingredients1}, #{ingredients2}, #{ingredients3}, #{cooking}, recipe_basic_seq.CURRVAL || '_thumb.jpg', recipe_basic_seq.CURRVAL || '_fin.jpg', #{time}, #{recipelevel}, #{recipetitle}, #{recipedesc}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT R.*, NVL2(G.custpin,'1','0') as logincustlike FROM Recipe_Basic R LEFT OUTER JOIN GoodList G ON R.recipepin = G.recipepin AND G.custpin = #{logincustpin} WHERE 1=1
AND R.ingredients1 LIKE '%' || #{ingredients1} || '%'
AND R.type LIKE '%' || #{type} || '%'
AND R.recipelevel LIKE '%' || #{recipelevel} || '%'
AND R.recipetitle LIKE '%' || #{recipetitle} || '%'
ORDER BY R.recipepin DESC
SELECT * FROM recipe_basic where recipetitle LIKE '%' || #{recipetitle} || '%' ORDER BY recipepin DESC
SELECT R.*, NVL2(G.custpin, '1', '0') as logincustlike FROM recipe_basic R LEFT OUTER JOIN goodlist G ON R.recipepin = G.recipepin AND G.custpin = #{logincustpin} WHERE R.recipepin = #{recipepin}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM recipe_basic WHERE situation = '1') AS subtable WHERE type = #{type} ORDER BY recipepin DESC
SELECT * FROM recipe_basic WHERE situation = #{situation} ORDER BY recipepin DESC
SELECT RECIPEPIN FROM goodlist GROUP BY RECIPEPIN ORDER BY COUNT(RECIPEPIN) DESC
select * from recipe_basic order by RECIPEDATE
select * from recipe_basic where CUSTPIN = (select SUBCUSTPIN from SUBSCRIBE where CUSTPIN = 10022) ORDER BY RECIPEDATE DESC
SELECT R.* FROM recipe_basic R INNER JOIN goodlist G ON R.recipepin = G.recipepin WHERE G.custpin = #{custpin}
